    • Method Detail

      • createRectBody

        public static com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.Body createRectBody(WorldManager world,
                                                                 com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 position,
                                                                 com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 size,
                                                                 com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.BodyDef.BodyType type,
                                                                 float density,
                                                                 boolean sensor)
        Creates a basic collideable rectangle body
        Parameters:
        world - world to create the body in
        position - location of the body
        size - size of the body (e.g. [32, 64])
        type - type of body - static, dynamic, kinematic
        density - density of the body
        sensor - whether the body is a sensor - this means it will not be collideable, but can still detect collisions
        Returns:
        returns the processed body

      • createRectangleFromMap

        public static com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.Body createRectangleFromMap(com.badlogic.gdx.maps.objects.RectangleMapObject rectObject,
                                                                         WorldManager world,
                                                                         com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.BodyDef.BodyType type,
                                                                         boolean sensor)
        Generate a rectangle body from a TiledMap rect object
        Parameters:
        rectObject - the rect from the tiledmap to be processed
        world - the world to create the body in
        type - the type of body - static, dynamic, or kinematic
        sensor - whether the body is a sensor - this means it will not be collideable, but can still detect collisions
        Returns:
        return the processed body

      • createPolyBody

        public static com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.Body createPolyBody(WorldManager world,
                                                                 float[] vertices,
                                                                 com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.BodyDef.BodyType type,
                                                                 float density,
                                                                 boolean sensor)
        Creates a basic collideable polygon body object
        Parameters:
        world - Wold to be created in
        vertices - a list of vertices (clockwise)
        type - type of body - static, dynamic, or kinematic
        density - density og body
        sensor - whether the body is a sensor - this means it will not be collideable, but can still detect collisions
        Returns:
        return the processed polygon body

      • createPolygonFromMap

        public static com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.Body createPolygonFromMap(com.badlogic.gdx.maps.objects.PolygonMapObject polygonObject,

                                                                       boolean sensor)
        Generate a polygon body from a TiledMap rect object
        Parameters:
        polygonObject - the polygon from the tiledmap to be processed
        world - world to create body in
        type - type of body - static, kinematic, or dynamic
        sensor - whether the body is a sensor - this means it will not be collideable, but can still detect collisions
        Returns:
        return the processed body
